definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (acc. to MV perh. = [[זְרוּעַ בָּבֶל]] begotten in Babylon, v. also Thes)—grandson of king Jehoiachin, and son of Pedaiah 1Ch 3:19, 1Ch 3:19 (but son of Shealtiel Ezr 3:2, Ezr 3:8 etc., cf. [[שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל]] brother (?) of [[פְּדָיׇה]] 1Ch 3:17); leader of first returning exiles Ezr 2:2 = Ne 7:7, Ezr 3:2, Ezr 3:8, Ezr 4:2, Ezr 4:3, Ne 12:1, Ne 12:47, Hag 1:12, Hag 2:4, Zec 4:6, Zec 4:7, Zec 4:9, Zec 4:10, called [[פַּחַת יְהוּדָה]] Hag 1:1, Hag 1:14, Hag 2:2, Hag 2:21, called [[עַבְדִּי]] (by ´[[י]]) Hag 2:23.—LXX Zorobabel.
